评论详情: Dress looks really cute but has 'odd' fit.  I ordered XTRA large and overall it fit well EXCEPT for the neckline.  Both the front and back necklines had gaps.  Perhaps if the dress had elastic there to hold it close to the body it would have looked better.  Also, the satiny part of the dress skirt is way shorter (by 6 inches) than the lacy overskirt.  So, it looks weird on.  I had originally ordered the pink dress and thought the issues were a problem with that particular dress.  Also I didn't care for that shade of pink so ordered another dress in white.  The color and rose pattern were perfect but the white dress has the same issues (baggy neckline and weird hemlines) so it is how that style of dress is made.  Too bad, because I would have loved the white dress it those issues didn't exist.
